name: Light of Truth
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You hold up one hand that continually shines a piercing light that illuminates the area. All falsehoods within are banished - creatures can't tell lies, hidden messages are revealed, and Illusion and Enchantment spells of equal or lower tier than this spell can't be cast, and have their effects ended immediately.

The light moves with your hand. You can't carry anything in that hand while concentrating on this spell, or the effect is suspended until your hand is free.
